#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long
using namespace std;

ll cnt_last(ll n)
{
    while(n/10!=0)
    {
        n%=10;
    }
    return n;
}

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        ll n,p;
        cin>>n>>p;
       // cout<<pow(n,p)<<endl;
        ll x = cnt_last(n);
        ll c = 0,l=x;
        while(1)
        {
            c++;
            ll m = x*l;
            if(cnt_last(m)==x)
            break;
            l = cnt_last(m);
        }
       // c++;
        ll an = p%c;
        if(an==0)
        an = c;
        ll ans = x;
        //cout<<an<<endl;
        for(ll i=1;i<an;i++)
        {
            ans = ans*x;
        }
        ll a = cnt_last(ans);
        if(p==0)
        cout<<"1"<<endl;
        else
        cout<<a<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
